Synopsis: Set the Git configuration for the GitHub context.
Description: Sets the Git configuration for the GitHub context. This command sets the `user.name`, `user.email`, and `url.<host>.insteadOf` git configs.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Set-GitHubGitConfig
Sets the Git configuration for the default GitHub context.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
Set-GitHubGitConfig -Context 'MyContext'
Sets the Git configuration for the GitHub context named 'MyContext'.
